text:
I just wanted to tell you guys I'm sorry that
I haven't been uploading videos lately.

I've been on the road touring, doing a lot
of shows and being able to see the world.

And getting ready for the holiday season,
so I'm really excited to get back into things.

I want to, you know, really get my youtube
back going, give you guys, you know, something

And, basically, there's this competition,
and I wanna tell you about it, so...

YouTube is starting this competition basically,
where you subscribe to random channels, and
you Tweet about them and stuff,

so it's called MyYouTube, so go check that
out, and subscribe to my page, which is youtube.com/justinbieber,
and uh, yeah, cool, let's do it. Peace.
